data.title: Poultrygeist: Night of the Chicken Dead
authors: Contributors to List of Deaths Wiki
data.meta_description: Poultrygeist: Night of The Chicken Dead is a 2006 horror/musical directed by Lloyd Kaufman and the uncredited Gabriel Friedman. When a fast food chicken restaurant is built on the site of an ancient Native American burial ground, the displaced spirits unite with the ghosts of exterminated...
